text: Emotional Anil Kapoor breaks down at 'Mirzya' music launch event BMC Elections 2017: Ranveer Singh, Shraddha Kapoor, Zoya Akhtar, Gulzar, Rakeysh Omprakash Mehra cast their vote Social media is flooded with selfies of enthusiastic celebrity voters who exercised their franchise in the ongoing BMC elections. Bollywood came in full attendance to participate. Celebrities were pictured outside the polling booths and they took to Twitter to urge others to cast their vote. TNN | Feb 21, 2017, 12.15 PM IST Social media is flooded with selfies of enthusiastic celebrity voters who exercised their franchise in the ongoing BMC elections. Bollywood came in full attendance to participate. Celebrities were pictured outside the polling booths and they took to Twitter to urge others to cast their vote. Ranveer Singh took to his Twitter handle to post a picture of him with his finger inked and kept it simple by adding a caption- "Vote". The actor can be seen in a neon t-shirt, a cap and sunnies. V O T E üëÜüèΩ pic.twitter.com/TRfhsN8zNq ‚Äî Ranveer Singh (@RanveerOfficial) February 21, 2017 Aamir Khan's wife Kiran Rao was spotted too. Actress Shraddha Kapoor posted a picture to her social media account and tweeted, "Done voting. Please exercise your right & go vote!" Done voting. Please exercise your right & go vote! pic.twitter.com/W8RYHcuviM Sanjay Dutt's wife Maanayata Dutt also posed for the cameras outside the polling booth in Bandra. Others who came in to cast their vote included directors Zoya Akhtar , Gulzar and Rakeysh Omprakash Mehra.
